attributes.action: STOP THIS MARCH NOW, DEFEND WOOTTON BASSET
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ISLAM4UK ARE PLANNING TO MARCH ON WOOTON BASSET IN THE NEAR FUTURE
THIS MARCH MUST NOT TAKE PLACE PLEASE DEFEND THE MEMORY OF OUR BRAVE TROOPS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
